abstract: The ad campaign for Phillycars.com attempts to play up the ability of online media to be targeted more narrowly than their mainstream, traditional counterparts.
snippet: The ad campaign for Phillycars.com attempts to play up the ability of online media to be targeted more narrowly than their mainstream, traditional counterparts.
lead_paragraph: Remember the jingle "Baseball, hot dogs, apple pie and Chevrolet"? A musical campaign for a new Web site offers a version that could be called "Phillies, cheese steaks, scrapple and all kinds of cars."

headline.main: Trying Not to Be Roadkill on the Schuylkill
